company.tagline: Accelerate the Development of AI Applications
company.description: Scale AI's mission is to develop reliable AI systems for the world’s most important decisions. They provide high-quality data and full-stack technologies that power the world’s leading models and enable enterprises and governments to build, deploy, and oversee AI applications that deliver real impact.

growth_metrics.geographic_expansion: Expanding offices in New York, London, Washington D.C., and St. Louis

events.title: Expanding Our Presence with New Offices Around the World
events.description: Scale AI is expanding offices in New York, London, Washington D.C., and St. Louis to support growth, innovation, and reliable AI development worldwide.

events.title: Scale AI Partners with Korea’s AI Safety Institute to Advance Global AI Evaluation and Governance
events.description: Scale AI partners with Korea’s AI Safety Institute to enhance global AI evaluation and governance efforts.

events.title: Why I Joined Scale: Building the Applications for Saudi Arabia's AI Future
events.description: Talal AlBakr joins Scale AI to focus on building production-ready AI applications that support Saudi Arabia’s Vision 2030.

events.title: Partnering with Lindbergh Schools to Prepare the Next Generation for the Age of AI
events.description: As part of the Pledge to America’s Youth, Scale AI collaborates with Lindbergh Schools to promote AI literacy in classrooms across America.
